name: Cluck!
description:
(Below Information Is Liable To Change)

Sokoban (or Boxxle, or Wonder Pile(we're scrapping the bottom of the barrel here!)) designed for the Gameboy, but, instead of pushing boxes, you're herding chickens!

  You (as a dog)

Chicken (which you are herding)

The usual rules apply:

 

  (A BUTTON)

  (START)
Movement


Undo Last Move


Menu

You just have to walk up to the chicken, and it'll move away from you.

BUT! There's a new feature added (sometime works, sometimes doesn't) and that is the UNDO ability.

Just press  and you'll be taken back a movement.

Currently, there's only 10 levels, and no save mode (I'll be working on that at some point).

Cluck has been developed using the amazing GB Studio.
